transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello ha ji.
Customer: Ha ji sir sir ek bar jo aapne mujhe wo bheja hai na screenshot usme recommendation select ho rakha hai ek bar aap India select kariye usme phone me.
Executive: Application on karke India select karke recent karna hai.
Customer: Phone
Customer: me jo hai na location pe click kara to ye all pe hi laga hua hai all location.
Executive: All nahi India all all nahi sir India India.
Customer: Accha madam India me jyada kuch aata hi nahi hai sare hata le aur kya kare deta hu.
Executive: Sir India me aap India me hi deal karte hai India me sare state aayenge aapko aap India select kariye.
Customer: India me laptop me select kar diya hai phone me select nahi ho raha hai.
Executive: Laptop phone me karo phone pe sir phone me karna hai aapne.
Customer: Phone me mai usme aa raha hai location aapka Haryana Rajasthan.
Executive: Actually aapne jo mujhe screenshot bheja hai phone me aapne recommended recommended pe click kar rakha hai aap India all hata dijiye India pe click karke uske baad recent kariye.
Customer: Thik hai karta hu.
Executive: Ha.
Executive: Kariye aur mujhe bataiye ab aapko dikh rahi hai dikh rahi hongi.
Customer: Thik hai mai karta hu.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer unable to view India-specific results.

Resolution:

- Executive guided to select India in application.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- location, india, application, screenshot
